SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Controls the volume of the emulator's sound output.

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Mute All Sound
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: Prevents the emulator from emitting any sound.

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Mute CD Audio
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: Forcibly mutes both CD-DA and XA audio from the CD-ROM. Can be used to disable background music in some games.

ListPreference.app:title: Audio Buffer Size
ListPreference.app:summary: Determines the latency between audio being generated and output to speakers. Smaller values reduce latency, but variations in emulation speed will cause hitches.

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Audio Sync
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: Throttles the emulation speed based on the audio backend pulling audio frames. This helps to remove noises or crackling if emulation is too fast. Sync will automatically be disabled if not running at 100% speed.
